data.name: Lazy gang
data.detailed_description:
Key features:


  • A fascinating plot. The serene days of the main characters came to an end when they were kidnapped by a mysterious stranger. To get home, a squad of lazy people will have to explore mysterious islands, carry out orders from local residents, collect local currency in the form of shells, pump skills and knock out artifacts from bosses.

  • 3 playable characters. Each character has its own class, unique abilities and style of play.
    A universal warrior - balanced, can be both a support fighter and an attacker.
    Tank Healer - prevents a huge amount of damage and restores the lost health of allies.
    Agile Rogue - moves quickly, slows down opponents with poison, but has a small number of lives.

  • Cooperative Use the features of the selected character to the maximum, combining them with the features of the character of a friend.

  • Exciting boss battles.
    -Adjust to unpredictable attacks
    -Fight off waves of minions
    -Use special moves and types of weapons

Locations:


5 islands with a huge number of Easter eggs.
  • Volcanic Island
  • Dense forest
  • Pumpkin fields
  • Island of sweets
  • Techno island

data.short_description: The main characters will have to reluctantly unite in a mercenary squad and go on an adventure to distant islands.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x86/x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 | AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2 GB) | AMD Radeon HD 7850 (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 @3.20GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R9 M370X (2GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only AMD Radeon™ graphics cards are officially supported.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit and newer recommended
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500 @3.3 GHz / AMD FX-8320 @3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2 GB) | AMD Radeon HD 7850 (2 GB)
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
